data.text: “Adɛn nti na Onyankopɔn nhyɛ bere mma atemmu?
Nnipa yiyi abo a wɔde ato ɔhye;
Wɔpam ayisaa mfurum
Wosum ahiafo fi kwan so
Sɛnea sare so mfurum yɛ no
Wɔboaboa mmoa aduan ano wɔ mfuw no so
Wonni ntama, na wɔda adagyaw anadwo;
Mmepɔw so osu tɔ fɔw wɔn kyam
Wɔtew ayisaa fi nufu ano;
Wɔnenam adagyaw a wonni ntama;
Wokyi ngo wɔn adan mu;
Wɔn a wɔrewuwu no apinisi fi kuropɔn no mu,
“Ebinom wɔ hɔ a wɔsɔre tia hann no,
Sɛ adekyee hann no kɔ a, owudifo no sɔre
Ɔwaresɛefo twɛn bere a anim rebiribiri;
Sum mu na nnipa bubu apon wura afi mu,
Sum kabii yɛ adekyee ma wɔn nyinaa;
“Nanso wɔte sɛ ahuru a ɛte nsu ani;
Sɛnea ɔhyew ne ɔpɛ hwim sukyerɛmma a anan kɔ no,
Awotwaa werɛ fi wɔn,
Wɔde ɔbea bonin a onni ba yɛ hanam,
Onyankopɔn nam ne tumi so twe atumfo kɔ;
Otumi ma wɔn tena ase asomdwoe mu,
Wɔma wɔn so bere tiaa bi, na afei wonni hɔ bio;
“Sɛ eyi nte saa a, hena na obetumi agye me akyinnye
